markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mask of Uncanny Breath](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2326)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 150 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A thin wooden mask carved in the shape of a skull, monstrous face, or eerily featureless visage, a mask of uncanny breath fully covers your face. While wearing it, each breath you take feels cool and pure, perfectly flowing to feed your ki. You gain resistance 10 to [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) and can breathe in an airless or toxic environment. When you breathe in, fragments of bizarre knowledge flow through you, granting you a +2 item bonus to [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) checks.

<document level="2" id="action-1878" />

<document level="2" id="action-1879" />

**Craft Requirements** You are a [monk](/Classes.aspx?ID=8) with occult ki spells.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Mask of Uncanny Breath

While wearing it, each breath you take feels cool and pure, perfectly flowing to feed your ki. You gain resistance 10 to inhaled poisons and can breathe in an airless or toxic environment. When you breathe in, fragments of bizarre knowledge flow through you, granting you a +2 item bonus to Occultism checks. Craft Requirements You are a monk with occult ki spells.
